Title: It's Always Been This Way
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Stephen Falk, Eva Anderson, Philippe Iujvidin (story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Jimmy and Gretchen go for a long drive to force a conclusion on the confusing state of their relationship. Edgar finds closure with Max while Lindsay figures out a way to solve Becca, Vernon, and Paul's problems all at once.
